name: rentrider
description: Bike rental platform with customer, owner, and admin interfaces

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run admin:dev"
scripts.server:dev: cd server && PORT=5001 npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
